text: Drasteria sinuosa is a moth of the family Erebidae. It is found in Turkey, Iran, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Afghanistan and Turkmenistan.Naturkundliches Informationssystem ==References== Category:Drasteria Category:Moths described in 1884 Category:Moths of Asia Category:Moths of Turkey Category:Taxa named by Otto Staudinger
title: Drasteria sinuosa
